CatDescriptText: Mary Ann Prezioso, 1090 Bower Hill Rd., Bridgeville, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 6, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that too much leniency is shown teenagers who commit crimes?" answer reads: "In some cases there is too much leniency shown. However, in my opinion, I believe that it depends on who the teenager is and how he was brought up."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mary Ann Prezioso wearing dark button down flecked coat and light colored button down collared blouse, holding dark gloves and paper bag, standing in front of Ritter and Morrison store window displaying men's dress shoes
